data.title: SLA Industries 2nd Edition: COLLATERAL
data.text:
(loading your very own snazzy kicktraq chart)

Now you can share!

Help your backers reach your daily goals and help others see how you're doing. It's easy, with Kicktraq Mini.

Here are a few quick snippits of code you can use to embed your personalized widget on your website, in your blog, and even on your favorite forum.

HTML for websites & blogs

Copy HTML

BBCode for forums

Copy BBCode

Reddit code for... well, Reddit

Copy Reddit Code

Special Note: Kickstarter recently disabled remote embedding for images on project pages, so embedding code doesn't work on project pages (yet) - just everywhere else.

You can read more about it here.

September 16th - via: kickstarter.com

We are eight hours from the end of this Kickstarter and so its time for the final push: Social Goals To get on the Kicktraq Hotlist we need to the SLA Industries: COLLATERAL Kicktraq page and do lots of commenting on our comments section AND get lots... (Read More)

September 11th - via: kickstarter.com

Today we release two new Social Stretch Goals: https://discord.com/invite/QRrQhW4cZB Apathy Apathy has been a part of the SLA mythos since the world of progress's conception, but now at last it has art: Back in the 890/900sd period Apathy was... (Read More)

September 9th - via: kickstarter.com

As promised last update we wanted to give you a bit more on some of the newer Add ons we have organised: All Rolled Up! The All Rolled Up! is the brainchild of Fil Baldowski, who's company is also named 'All Rolled Up!', she is also the inventor of... (Read More)

September 7th - via: kickstarter.com

We are excited to be at the position that we can now release the option for a Faux Leatherbound version of Threat Analysis: COLLATERAL. This book will come with a numbered certificate signed by the Managing Director of Nightfall Games, Mark Rapson,... (Read More)

September 6th - via: kickstarter.com

We have worked our way quickly through the Stretch Goals we published at the end of last week...so now it is time for more: (Read More)

September 5th - via: kickstarter.com

The Slasher is unlocked! The 24 page A5 sized 'The Slasher', Issue 1 has now been added to all pledge levels of 'Working for the Bad Guys' and above and can be added to other pledges for just £2. Within SLA Industries, The Slasher is a small... (Read More)

September 4th - via: kickstarter.com

Kickstarter Exclusive Dice Tray We have just commissioned 'All Rolled Up!' to make a new neoprene travel dice tray featuring the new cover artwork for COLLATERAL by Dave Allsop. This product will only be available to backers of this Kickstarter and... (Read More)

August 31st - via: kickstarter.com

Social Stretch goals Our social stretch goals are designed to get the word out there so more people know about this Kickstarter and to ensure you all know about the various resources out there for SLA Industries. Here are the links for these: The... (Read More)

August 29th - via: kickstarter.com

Wow what a great first five days! With the level of funding we can now start to create some of the cool extras we were hoping for, first up is the Kickstarter exclusive alternative cover for 'Threat Analysis 1 - COLLATERAL' Dave has been working... (Read More)

August 26th - via: kickstarter.com

BPN Pads are now added to every pledge, from Aethernaut upwards. You will get a free pad with every pledge, but if you need more, we're selling them at £4 each, or three for £10. Just increase your pledge by the amount you want to spend and we'll... (Read More)

August 25th - via: kickstarter.com

Threat Analysis 1: Collateral will now go into more detail on the Manchines that plague Mort City, including a few that have sneaked in from the Cannibal Sectors. On top of that, The Aethernaut Tracker will be a playable character class, adding to... (Read More)

August 25th - via: kickstarter.com

Welcome to the first SLA Industries sourcebook kickstarter, where we are adding Threat Analysis 1: Collateral, Species Guide 1: Shaktar/Wraithen and Hunter Sheets: Data Files 1 PDF to the line up of books for the ENnie Award winning roleplaying game... (Read More)

August 24th - via: kickstarter.com

Now that we have passed £17,500 and unlocked Dave's next Deep Construct fiction, we would like to share the next run of Stretch Goals with you. What is Mister Minty? Is that really a BPN pad? Do you really want to have to deal with more Manchines?... (Read More)
